summary: Work around to fix the problem of magicka regeneration not scaling probably when enchanting. Finally you will be able to enchant your Robes with enchantments that are as good as the ones Vendors have.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Description:[/u][/b]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Have you ever wondered why the crafting skill that is considered to be \"Mage\" related actually provides the least benefits to proper Mages?! Well, yeah so have I. Even as the most powerful enchanter in all of Skyrim with everything maxed plus additional potions I still can\'t seem to craft a Robe that is anywhere close to being as powerful as the Robes I can simply find on random loot or buy from vendors.

Because I couldn\'t find a mod that only did just this, I decided to read a few tutorials and created my first own mod to fix this.

As I could not seem to fix the issues of magicka regeneration effects (for Enchantments: Fortify <Magic School> & Fortify Magick not scaling even with increasing enchanting skilly, I decided to do a work around by adding new base enchantments.

Now there are 5 Ranks of \"Fortify <Magic School> & Fortify Magicka Regeneration\" Enchantments which can be acquired by disenchanting Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert and Master Robes of the repsective School. Additionally there is a new base enchantment \"Fortify Magicka Regeneration II\" which only works chest items(unlike the normal version of Fortify Magicka Regeneration which also works on fead, finger and neck).



[u][b]Changelog:[/u][/b]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[b]Version 1.1:[/b]

- Changed the base magnitude of the \"Fortify <Magic School>\" effect to 8% for all levels to make disenchanting a found or bought robe a viable option.

- Changed the restrictions for all new enchantments so that they can only be applied to cloth. (chest requirement also still remains)




[u][b]Summary of Features:[/u][/b]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Changed:[/b]

[u]\"Fortify <Magic School> & Fortify Magicka Regeneration\" [/u]
- to base values 8% and 50% respectively // (Vanilla: 5% and 10%)



[b]Added:[/b]

[u]\"Fortify <Magic School> & Fortify Magicka Regeneration II\"[/u]
- base value 8% and 75%
- acquired by disenchanting \"Apprentice Robe of <Magic School>\"

[u]\"Fortify <Magic School> & Fortify Magicka Regeneration III\"[/u]
- base value 8% and 100%
- acquired by disenchanting \"Adept Robe of <Magic School>\"

[u]\"Fortify <Magic School> & Fortify Magicka Regeneration IV\"[/u]
- base value 8% and 125%
- acquired by disenchanting \"Expert Robe of <Magic School>\"

[u]\"Fortify <Magic School> & Fortify Magicka Regeneration V\"[/u]
- base value 8% and 150%
- acquired by disenchanting \"Master Robe of <Magic School>\"

[u]\"Fortify Magicka Regeneration II\"[/u]
- base value 64%
- acquired by disenchanting any Robe with \"Fortify Magicka Regeneration\" effects.





[u][b]Installation:[/u][/b]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just extract the .esp-file into your \"...\\Skyrim\\Data\\\" folder and select it via the \'Data\' option in the Launcher.

(I think everybody knows how to do that really)





[u][b]Compatibility:[/u][/b]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Should run fine with everything that doesn\'t touch the base enchantments that i modified, but I am not running too many mods so I can\'t be 100% sure.






[u][b]Notes:[/u][/b]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

With the new enchantmens at Enchanting 100 and All relevant enchanting perks (no potions) you will get the following results:

[u]\"Fortify <Magic School> & Fortify Magicka Regeneration V\"[/u]
Reduce cost of <Magic School> spells by 25%
Fortify Magicka Regenoration by 150%
[i]This equals exactly the strength of a vanilla Master Robe[/i]

[u]\"Fortify Magicka Regeneration II\"[/u]
Fortify Magicka Regeneration by 200%
[i]This is somewhat stronger than the Master Robes with only Magicka Regeneration but felt necessary to keep it as a useful option in comparison to the now stronger combo enchantments[/i]


If you are concerned about balance issues when this is combined with the \"Extra Effect\" Perk you might want to check out this mod instead: [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10119] Craftable Enchanted Robes [/URL]
